function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"High fatality rate and large number of deaths worldwide","Mitigation":"Implement strict containment measures and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, and testing kits","People":"Global population, particularly vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Emergence of novel infectious diseases","Impact":"Potential for future pandemics with high fatality rates","Mitigation":"Invest in global surveillance systems, research, and vaccine development","Technologies":"Surveillance networks, advanced diagnostic tools, and vaccine development platforms","People":"Global population, particularly vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Global health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Manipulation of infectious disease data","Impact":"Loss of reliability and transparency in disease data","Mitigation":"Implement secure and tamper-proof data storage systems","Technologies":"Blockchain, decentralized data storage, encryption","People":"Public health authorities, research institutions","Owner":"Technology developers, public health agencies"}]}
